about_the_game:
Reality End Metaverse Multiplayer Shooter.
The new version includes VR and Non-VR modes, Ready Player Me metaverse avatars, Tanks, Cars, Special Attacks, Voice chat, and more.

Features

  • Room-based.
  • VR controller support.
  • Ready Player Me - avatars support.
  • Vehicles including Cars and Tanks.
  • Special attacks - UAV, Drone support, and Missiles.
  • 4 Game modes: Free for all, Team Deathmatch, Capture the flag, Demolition, Bases.
  • Left/Right-handedness support.
  • Voice communication.
  • AI bots.
  • VR Hand Pad with command buttons.
  • Multi-Mode - VR and Standard.

Updating Daily!

name: Reality End Demo
short_description: Metaverse Multiplayer Shooter. Based on Lovato MFPS and integrated with Oculus and VR Interaction Framework.
